snippet: Ms. Catlett’s abstracted sculptures of the human form reflected her deep concern with the African-American experience and the struggle for civil rights.
abstract: Elizabeth Catlett, whose abstract sculptures of the human form reflected her deep concern with the African-American experience and the struggle for civil rights, dies at age 96.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Catlett’s abstracted sculptures of the human form reflected her deep concern with the African-American experience and the struggle for civil rights.

headline.seo: Elizabeth Catlett, Sculptor With Eye on Social Issues, Dies at 96
headline.main: Elizabeth Catlett, Sculptor With Eye on Social Issues, Is Dead at 96
headline.print_headline: Elizabeth Catlett, Sculptor With Eye on Social Issues, Is Dead at 96
